trans-unit.source: "You can break nothing I cannot mend."
trans-unit.target: 「你能打坏的东西，我都能修好。」

trans-unit.target: 所结附的生物不能进行攻击或阻挡，其起动式异能也不能起动。

trans-unit.source: Bladehold houses a rogues' gallery filled with the living "statues" of the worst enemies of the Auriok.
trans-unit.target: 锐锋城塞有个厅，专门展示欧瑞克最强敌人的活生生「雕像」。

trans-unit.target: 金技～只要你操控三个或更多神器，CARDNAME便具有连击异能。

trans-unit.source: Auriok soldiers craft their own weapons, forging a connection to the steel with each blow of the hammer.
trans-unit.target: 欧瑞克士兵自行打造武器，每次榔头敲击都代表与钢铁更进一步的关联。

trans-unit.target: 金技～只要你操控三个或更多神器，CARDNAME便得+2/+2并具有飞行异能。

trans-unit.source: "Grant me loft. Grant me light. Grant me the accuracy I need to kill all who threaten Bladehold."\n—Prayer to the Whitesun
trans-unit.target: 「赐我翱翔。 赐我光明。 赐我精准，好将威胁锐锋城塞的敌人消灭殆尽。」 ～白阳祷文

trans-unit.source: The Accorders never strike first, but they always strike back.

trans-unit.source: Its eyes burned nearly blind by the Whitesun, it hunts by metallic gleam.

trans-unit.source: "I am not Raksha. I never will be. But I refuse to be the kha who watched her pride be torn asunder."
trans-unit.target: 「我不是洛夏。 我永远都不会是。 而我拒绝担任眼见自己狮群分裂的狮王。」

trans-unit.source: The Auriok see the artificer as a conduit, beckoning new creations into the world.

trans-unit.target: 「别不干脆，勿留后悔。 没人会提到这天发生的事。 它将像是从未存在一样。」 ～象族秘教徒格涅多

trans-unit.source: "I'm not saying it's dangerous work. I'm just saying don't sign up if you have plans for your seventieth birthday."

trans-unit.source: Counter target artifact spell.

trans-unit.resname: SOM·34 | Halt Order | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: An artificer's least favorite mind-missive may be "I regret to inform you that the funding for your project has been cut."
trans-unit.target: 神器师最讨厌的心灵公文可能就是这样：「在此很遗憾地通知：您的计划资金已被删减。」

trans-unit.source: Inexorable Tide
trans-unit.target: 难阻浪潮

trans-unit.resname: SOM·35 | Inexorable Tide | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast a spell, proliferate. (You choose any number of permanents and/or players with counters on them, then give each another counter of a kind already there.)
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放一个咒语时，增殖。 （你选择任意数量其上有指示物的永久物和／或牌手，然后在其上放置一个它已有之类别的指示物。）

trans-unit.source: "See how gratefully this world accepts our blessings."\n—Jin-Gitaxias, Core Augur
trans-unit.target: 「瞧瞧，这世界是如此心存感激地接受我们的祝福。」 ～核心卜算师金吉塔厦

trans-unit.source: Lumengrid Drake
trans-unit.target: 博识都龙兽

trans-unit.resname: SOM·36 | Lumengrid Drake | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: SOM·36 | Lumengrid Drake | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Metalcraft — When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, if you control three or more artifacts, return target creature to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 金技～当CARDNAME进战场时，若你操控三个或更多神器，将目标生物移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.source: Properly outfitted, drakes made perfect sentries for vedalken strongholds.
trans-unit.target: 只要加上合适的配备，龙兽便是维多肯要塞的完美哨兵。

trans-unit.source: Neurok Invisimancer
trans-unit.target: 纽若克隐身术士

trans-unit.resname: SOM·37 | Neurok Invisimancer | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME is unblockable.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME不能被阻挡。

trans-unit.resname: SOM·37 | Neurok Invisimancer | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, target creature is unblockable this turn.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，目标生物本回合中不能被阻挡。

trans-unit.source: "They won't see your shadow or hear your breath, but they will feel your blade."
trans-unit.target: 「他们看不到你的影子、听不见你的呼吸，但将会感受到你的刀锋。」

trans-unit.source: Plated Seastrider
trans-unit.target: 板甲海行客

trans-unit.source: The Neurok buried entangling cables just under the Quicksilver Sea. One seastrider harvest can provide an army's worth of armor and shields.
trans-unit.target: 纽若克人在水银海底下埋藏纠结缆绳。 捕获一个海行客，就能让整个部队不缺铠甲与盾牌。

trans-unit.source: Quicksilver Gargantuan
trans-unit.target: 水银巨兽

trans-unit.resname: SOM·39 | Quicksilver Gargantuan | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: You may have CARDNAME enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield, except it's still 7/7.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使CARDNAME当成战场上任一生物的复制品来进入战场，且它依旧是7/7。

trans-unit.source: "You know you have achieved true power if the sea itself seeks to emulate your greatness."\n—Vy Covalt, Neurok agent
trans-unit.target: 「如果连大海都想模拟你的长处，你就知道自己获取了真正的力量。」 ～纽若克密探范科沃

trans-unit.source: Riddlesmith
trans-unit.target: 谜题工匠

trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast an artifact spell, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放一个神器咒语时，你可以抓一张牌。若你如此作，弃一张牌。

trans-unit.source: The Neurok see the artificer as an archaeologist, clearing away falsehoods to see the truth hidden beneath.
trans-unit.target: 纽若克人将神器师看作考古学家，厘清谬误好看见底下埋藏的事实。

trans-unit.source: Scrapdiver Serpent
trans-unit.target: 废铁潜蛇

trans-unit.resname: SOM·41 | Scrapdiver Serpent | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME is unblockable as long as defending player controls an artifact.
trans-unit.target: 只要防御牌手操控神器，CARDNAME就不能被阻挡。

trans-unit.source: Smart artificers clean up after themselves.
trans-unit.target: 聪明的神器师会自行清理干净。

trans-unit.source: Screeching Silcaw
trans-unit.target: 尖鸣银海鸦

trans-unit.resname: SOM·42 | Screeching Silcaw | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: SOM·42 | Screeching Silcaw | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Metalcraft — Whenever CARDNAME deals combat damage to a player, if you control three or more artifacts, that player puts the top four cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 金技～每当CARDNAME对牌手造成战斗伤害时，若你操控三个或更多神器，该牌手将其牌库顶的四张牌置入其坟墓场。

trans-unit.source: It's adaptively deaf to its own cries.
trans-unit.target: 他已因自己的鸣叫声失去听力。

trans-unit.source: Shape Anew
trans-unit.target: 重塑型体

trans-unit.resname: SOM·43 | Shape Anew | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: The controller of target artifact sacrifices it, then reveals cards from the top of his or her library until he or she reveals an artifact card. That player puts that card onto the battlefield, then shuffles all other cards revealed this way into his or her library.
trans-unit.target: 目标神器的操控者将它牺牲，并从其牌库顶开始展示牌，直到他展示出一张神器牌为止。该玩家将该牌放进战场，然后将所有其他以此法展示的牌洗入其牌库。

trans-unit.source: Sky-Eel School
trans-unit.target: 滑风鱼群

trans-unit.resname: SOM·44 | Sky-Eel School | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: SOM·44 | Sky-Eel School | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, draw a card, then discard a card.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，抓一张牌，然后弃一张牌。

trans-unit.source: They swim on tides few can see, away from a threat few yet understand.
trans-unit.target: 他们在常人看不见的潮流中泳行，躲避着常人不了解的威胁。

trans-unit.source: Steady Progress
trans-unit.target: 稳定进展

trans-unit.resname: SOM·45 | Steady Progress | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Proliferate. (You choose any number of permanents and/or players with counters on them, then give each another counter of a kind already there.)
trans-unit.target: 增殖。 （你选择任意数量其上有指示物的永久物和／或牌手，然后在其上放置一个它已有之类别的指示物。）

trans-unit.resname: SOM·45 | Steady Progress | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "More of that strange oil . . . It's probably nothing."
trans-unit.target: 「多上点那个奇怪的油...这应该没关系。」

trans-unit.source: Stoic Rebuttal
trans-unit.target: 寡欲抗辩

trans-unit.resname: SOM·46 | Stoic Rebuttal | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Metalcraft — CARDNAME costs {1} less to cast if you control three or more artifacts.
trans-unit.target: 金技～如果你操控三个或更多神器，CARDNAME便减少{1}来施放。

trans-unit.resname: SOM·46 | Stoic Rebuttal | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Counter target spell.
trans-unit.target: 反击目标咒语。

trans-unit.source: Obsessed with the pursuit of knowledge above all else, vedalken can appear to be cold and emotionless.
trans-unit.target: 维多肯着迷于追求知识而不顾其他，因此显得冷漠而缺乏情绪。

trans-unit.source: Thrummingbird
trans-unit.target: 敲击鸟

trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME deals combat damage to a player, proliferate. (You choose any number of permanents and/or players with counters on them, then give each another counter of a kind already there.)
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME对牌手造成战斗伤害时，增殖。 （你选择任意数量其上有指示物的永久物和／或牌手，然后在其上放置一个它已有之类别的指示物。）

trans-unit.source: Trinket Mage
trans-unit.target: 琐物法师

trans-unit.resname: SOM·48 | Trinket Mage | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an artifact card with converted mana cost 1 or less, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你可以从你的牌库中搜寻一张总法术力费用小于或等于1的神器牌，展示该牌，并将它置于你手上。 若你如此作，则将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.source: Turn Aside
trans-unit.target: 避开

trans-unit.resname: SOM·49 | Turn Aside | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Counter target spell that targets a permanent you control.
trans-unit.target: 反击目标咒语，且该咒语须以由你操控的永久物为目标。

trans-unit.source: "It's not my job to ask our leaders about their experiments at the Knowledge Pool. It's my job to make sure they can continue performing them."
trans-unit.target: 「我的职责不是去询问领导者们在知识之池作了怎样的实验。 我的职责是确保他们可以继续作下去。」

trans-unit.source: Twisted Image
trans-unit.target: 扭曲影像

trans-unit.resname: SOM·50 | Twisted Image | Card Text | Paragraph 1

trans-unit.target: 将目标生物之力量与防御力互换直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: SOM·50 | Twisted Image | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "True strength is in the mind, for the body is too malleable a form."\n—Politus, vedalken emisar
trans-unit.target: 「真正的力量来自心灵，因为身体这外型太易改变。」 ～维多肯传理使波礼多

trans-unit.source: Vault Skyward
trans-unit.target: 跃向天空

trans-unit.resname: SOM·51 | Vault Skyward | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target creature gains flying until end of turn. Untap it.
trans-unit.target: 目标生物获得飞行异能直到回合结束。 将之重置。

trans-unit.source: "The edges of the Quicksilver Sea run dark with the spread of the Mephidross. Two more aerial passes before I can be sure what I'm seeing . . ."\n—Lafarius, Neurok sky agent
trans-unit.target: 「随着蔓非沼蔓延，水银海边境也变得黑暗。 再从空中看个两次，我就能确定自己看到了些什么...」 ～纽若克空特务拉法瑞

trans-unit.source: Vedalken Certarch
trans-unit.target: 维多肯证理师

trans-unit.resname: SOM·52 | Vedalken Certarch | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Metalcraft — {T}: Tap target artifact, creature, or land. Activate this ability only if you control three or more artifacts.
trans-unit.target: 金技～{T}：横置目标神器，生物或地。 你只可以于你操控三个或更多神器时起动此异能。

trans-unit.source: "An appropriately detailed model is indistinguishable from reality, and much easier to control."
trans-unit.target: 「最详实的模型得与现实几无出入，并且操纵起来更加简单。」

trans-unit.source: Volition Reins
trans-unit.target: 意志缰绳

trans-unit.resname: SOM·53 | Volition Reins | Card Text | Paragraph 1

trans-unit.target: 结附于永久物

trans-unit.resname: SOM·53 | Volition Reins | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, if enchanted permanent is tapped, untap it.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，若所结附的永久物为横置，则重置之。

trans-unit.resname: SOM·53 | Volition Reins | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: You control enchanted permanent.
trans-unit.target: 你操控所结附的永久物。

trans-unit.source: "Glorifying the will is a mistake. It is simply one more force to be mastered."
trans-unit.target: 「如此推崇意志根本是个错误。 它只不过是另一种该去精通的力量。」

trans-unit.source: Blackcleave Goblin
trans-unit.target: 暗峰鬼怪

trans-unit.resname: SOM·54 | Blackcleave Goblin | Card Text | Paragraph 1

trans-unit.target: 敏捷

trans-unit.resname: SOM·54 | Blackcleave Goblin | Card Text | Paragraph 2

trans-unit.target: 侵染 （此生物会以-1/-1指示物的方式对生物造成伤害，并以中毒指示物的方式对牌手造成伤害。）

trans-unit.source: "Bitten? Save time, amputate now."\n—Lephar, loxodon surgeon
trans-unit.target: 「被咬了？ 省点时间，马上锯掉。」 ～象族医师列伐

trans-unit.resname: SOM·55 | Bleak Coven Vampires | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Bleak Coven Vampires
trans-unit.target: 峻集吸血鬼

trans-unit.resname: SOM·55 | Bleak Coven Vampires | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Metalcraft — When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, if you control three or more artifacts, target player loses 4 life and you gain 4 life.
trans-unit.target: 金技～当CARDNAME进战场时，若你操控三个或更多神器，目标牌手失去4点生命且你获得4点生命。

trans-unit.resname: SOM·55 | Bleak Coven Vampires | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: As the shadow of the Mephidross spread over the Tangle, the vampires' territory expanded.
trans-unit.target: 蔓非沼的阴影在铬铜林散播着，吸血鬼的领域也随之增广。

trans-unit.source: Blistergrub
trans-unit.target: 刺螫幼虫

trans-unit.source: Swampwalk
trans-unit.target: 沼泽行者

trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, each opponent loses 2 life.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME从战场进入坟墓场时，每位对手各失去2点生命。

trans-unit.source: "The sooner you join Phyrexia, the sooner you'll forget your painful rebirth."\n—Sheoldred, Whispering One
trans-unit.target: 「你愈快加入非瑞克西亚，自己的痛苦再生就忘得愈快。」 ～细语者希欧蕊

trans-unit.source: Carnifex Demon
trans-unit.target: 刽子手恶魔

trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.target: CARDNAME进战场时上面有两个-1/-1指示物。

trans-unit.target: {B}，从CARDNAME上移去一个-1/-1指示物：在每个其他生物上各放置一个-1/-1指示物。

trans-unit.source: Every contagion has a host.
trans-unit.target: 每个传染都有宿主。

trans-unit.target: 带原泞族

trans-unit.source: Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
trans-unit.target: 侵染 （此生物会以-1/-1指示物的方式对生物造成伤害，并以中毒指示物的方式对牌手造成伤害。）

trans-unit.source: "This species has grown to be my preferred receptacle for our divine message."\n—Sheoldred, Whispering One
trans-unit.target: 「这物种成长得很理想，适合盛装我们的神圣讯息。」 ～细语者希欧蕊

trans-unit.target: 腐化索命妖

trans-unit.source: {B}, Sacrifice a creature: Regenerate CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: {B}，牺牲一个生物：重生CARDNAME。

trans-unit.source: "Before the blessed assault begins, we must seek specimens that are well-adapted to our way of . . . life."\n—Sheoldred, Whispering One
trans-unit.target: 「在伟大的突袭开始前，我们必须找到完全能适应我们...生命方式的实验样本。」 ～细语者希欧蕊

trans-unit.source: Dross Hopper
trans-unit.target: 蔓非沼跳虫

trans-unit.target: 牺牲一个生物：CARDNAME获得飞行异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: Bred in the vicious Mephidross, dross hoppers learned to eat quickly and escape faster.
trans-unit.target: 这些跳虫在恶毒的蔓非沼成长，已学到如何花更少时间进食与逃离。

trans-unit.source: Exsanguinate
trans-unit.target: 放干鲜血

trans-unit.source: Each opponent loses X life. You gain life equal to the life lost this way.
trans-unit.target: 每位对手各失去X点生命。 你获得若干生命，其数量等同于以此法失去的生命总和。

trans-unit.source: Vampires don't consider patience a virtue nor gluttony a sin.
trans-unit.target: 对吸血鬼来说，耐心不是美德，贪食亦非罪恶。

trans-unit.source: Flesh Allergy
trans-unit.target: 肉身过敏

trans-unit.target: 消灭目标生物。 其操控者失去若干生命，其数量等同于本回合中从战场进入所有坟墓场的生物数量。

trans-unit.source: Fume Spitter

trans-unit.target: 牺牲CARDNAME：在目标生物上放置一个-1/-1指示物。

trans-unit.source: "Our archers made sport of it as it fumbled its way up the slag ridge. As it collapsed we thought ourselves safe, but the foul thing carried more than necrogen."\n—Adaran, Tangle hunter
trans-unit.target: 「当他笨手笨脚地爬上融滓山脊，我们的弓箭手只把他当成比赛的标靶。 它倒下时我们还自认安全得很，天知道那家伙带着的东西不只是化尸瘴而已。」 ～铬铜林猎手阿达岚

trans-unit.source: Instill Infection
trans-unit.target: 灌输侵染

trans-unit.source: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.
trans-unit.target: 在目标生物上放置一个-1/-1指示物。

trans-unit.target: 抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "The results of our ninth inoculation were the same. The specimen was, of course, euthanized before the contagion could spread."\n—Vedalken research notes
trans-unit.target: 「第九次的预防接种结果相同。 当然，在实验样本能够扩散传染之前便已将其安乐死。」 ～维多肯研究纪录

trans-unit.source: Memoricide
trans-unit.target: 屠忆咒

trans-unit.source: Name a nonland card. Search target player's graveyard, hand, and library for any number of cards with that name and exile them. Then that player shuffles his or her library.
trans-unit.target: 说出一个非地牌的名称。自目标牌手的坟墓场、手牌、以及牌库中搜寻任意数量该名称的牌，并将它们放逐。 然后该牌手将他的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.source: "You claim wisdom, yet I see nothing in here but tawdry wishes."
trans-unit.target: 「你索求智慧，但我在此只看到庸俗的愿望。」

trans-unit.source: Moriok Reaver
trans-unit.target: 莫锐可裂肢兵

trans-unit.source: "The Moriok are fools. They try so hard to gain my favor. All I want is for them to die quickly, to join the ranks of the nim."\n—Geth, Lord of the Vault
trans-unit.target: 「莫锐可人真愚蠢。 他们想尽办法要讨我欢心。 而我只希望他们快点死，好加入泞族的行列。」 ～黯窖之王盖司

trans-unit.source: Necrogen Scudder
trans-unit.target: 化尸瘴奔行兽

trans-unit.resname: SOM·71 | Necrogen Scudder | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: SOM·71 | Necrogen Scudder | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you lose 3 life.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你失去3点生命。

trans-unit.source: Contrary to popular belief, it's kept aloft by necrogen gas, not the screaming agony of a thousand murdered souls.
trans-unit.target: 与一般人的想法不同，它是因化尸瘴气体而浮在空中，而不是因为成千被杀的灵魂怨恨之力。

trans-unit.source: Necrotic Ooze
trans-unit.target: 溃疽流浆

trans-unit.resname: SOM·72 | Necrotic Ooze | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: As long as CARDNAME is on the battlefield, it has all activated abilities of all creature cards in all graveyards.
trans-unit.target: 只要CARDNAME在战场上，它便具有所有坟墓场中每张生物牌的所有起动式异能。

trans-unit.source: "To death all must go, and so in death lies ultimate power."\n—Geth, Lord of the Vault
trans-unit.target: 「万物终将死去，因此死亡蕴藏着终极力量。」 ～黯窖之王盖司

trans-unit.source: Painful Quandary
trans-unit.target: 痛苦窘境

trans-unit.target: 每当任一对手施放咒语时，除非该牌手弃一张牌，否则他失去5点生命。

trans-unit.source: "For each word spoken, one forgotten. For each thought, a memory rotten."\n—Moriok incantation
trans-unit.target: 「每说一个字，就忘记一个字。 每产生一个想法，就溃决一个记忆。」 ～莫锐可咒文

trans-unit.source: The Moriok see the artificer as a taskmaster, forcing lazy metal into more potent shapes.
trans-unit.target: 莫锐可人将神器师看作工头，逼迫懒惰的金属成为更加强劲的形状。

trans-unit.target: 「心灵可以坚决对抗疯狂，但任何城垛终有倾颓之日。」 ～核心卜算师金吉塔厦

trans-unit.target: 「直到我们解除萌智之诅咒前，得先忍受其怪诞后果。」 ～饥饿之声弗霖凯

trans-unit.target: 「别试着去打中所有敌人。 专心注意他们之间的空隙，然后以毁灭填满大气。」 ～矛族教谕

trans-unit.source: A single molten cord links it to the subterranean furnaces, drawing heat and metal from beneath Kuldotha. Until that bond is cut, it carves a swath of raw destruction.

trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped unless you control two or fewer other lands.
trans-unit.target: 除非由你操控的其他地数量为两个或更少，否则CARDNAME须横置进战场。

trans-unit.resname: SOM·229 | Seachrome Coast | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {W} or {U} to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{W}或{U}到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.source: Where the Quicksilver Sea laps over the Razor Fields, the landscape reflects the suns' fading hope.
trans-unit.target: 在水银海与锐草原野重叠之处，地景反射出太阳渐逝的希望。
